name: Burmy
flavorText:
To shelter itself from cold, wintry
winds, it covers itself with a cloak
made of twigs and leaves.
formDescription: Forms only affect appearance, although they become permanent upon evolution.  Wild and newly-hatched Burmy are always in a Plant Cloak.  Burmy's cloak changes to match the terrain after a battle it participated in: Plant Cloak by default; Sandy Cloak in sandy or rocky areas, such as beaches, caves, and trails; and Trash Cloak in buildings.
